p.span: In an effort to provide the most timely support to our students and families, please utilize the following list of contacts:

td.style: height: 22pt; width: 116.25pt; padding: 5pt; border: 1pt solid black; text-align: left;
height: 22pt; width: 351.75pt; padding: 5pt; border-top: 1pt solid black; border-right: 1pt solid black; border-bottom: 1pt solid black; border-left: none; text-align: left;

p.span: Please contact the teacher who assigned the activity for clarification. Individual office hours are linked by school below:

td.style: height: 22pt; width: 116.25pt; padding: 5pt; border-top: none; border-right: 1pt solid black; border-bottom: 1pt solid black; border-left: 1pt solid black; text-align: left;

p.span: Meal pickup at the Junior-Senior High School

li.span: Monday from 8:30 AM to 12:00 Noon &
Monday from 5:00 PM to 6:00 PM

span.span: Contact your child’s principal if a concern arises.
span.br: Complete the Weekly Survey for URGENT meal delivery.

td.style: height: 22pt; width: 116.25pt; padding: 5pt; border-top: none; border-right: 1pt solid black; border-bottom: 1pt solid black; border-left: 1pt solid black; text-align: left;

p.span: Please visit the registration website for more information.

td.style: height: 22pt; width: 116.25pt; padding: 5pt; border-top: none; border-right: 1pt solid black; border-bottom: 1pt solid black; border-left: 1pt solid black; text-align: left;

p.span: Contact your child’s principal for Chromebook repair. Device swaps need to be scheduled and are available at the Audubon Junior-Senior High on Tuesdays from:

li.span: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM and
5:00 PM to 6:00 PM
